Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "I knew it wouldn't be that easy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I better hurry up and finish President Hassen's mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hurtling through an emergency pipeline, Murray opens the hatch above him and enters the core area known as the tactical bridge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Bridge console, combat info center, then the database, huh...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sprawling and chaotic data avatar silently waits. Its tendrils incessantly reach for the terminal monitor.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: '(The latest update from the Kowloong war suggested that the Ascendants had snatched the key of Huaxu... Which means that the Ascendants are likely the culprits this time.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "(But I can't handle Huaxu one-on-one, and Cerberus... isn't here as well.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I'll have to avoid that thing's data radar and rush for the database.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: '(If Lee is here... he would be able to easily slip past that kind of data radar.)', 4: '1'}
